Title: Authorizes Joseph F. Delaney to apply for military service credit in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Joseph F. Delaney to apply for military service credit in the New York state and local employees' retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Joseph F. Delaney to apply for military service credit in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
